description:
Everybody is getting together for Lisa`s birthday party.
While Ōtani is absent from the party, Lisa is having a blast with her friends.
She remembers last year`s birthday and that`s when she realizes, no matter how much fun she`s having, if Ōtani is not there, it`s "just not right".
Right that moment, a text from Ōtani arrives.
Unbelievably, he`d been hiding behind a building.
When they`re alone, Ōtani confesses that it`s "just not right" when Lisa`s not there.
He follows up with a kiss!
Under the fireworks, Lisa`s love finally got through to Ōtani.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il compleanno più bello del mondo!
